document.forum_title: Latest Europe News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Rio Olympics confirm Britain as sport superpower
document.topic_text: Rio Olympics confirm Britain as sport superpower Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 1 hour ago ) Twenty years after a stinging Olympic failure, the UK has risen from the ashes to become a sporting "superpower" typified by the exploits of cycling lovebirds Jason Kenny and Laura Trott. RIO DE JANEIRO - Britain is now "a sporting superpower", one of the prime architects of its stunning success at the Rio Olympics on Sunday. Bangkok Post RIO DE JANEIRO, Aug 22 (Reuters) - Britain's Justin Rose and South Korea's Inbee Park won the first gold medals in golf in more than 100 years as the sport made... Reuters India 6 hours ago - Sports MATT LAWTON AND CHARLES SALE IN RIO: British Olympic bosses declared Team GB a ‘sporting superpower’ after their record haul of 67 medals lifted them to... MailOnline RIO DE JANEIRO, Aug 14 (Reuters) - Britain's Justin Rose birdied the final hole to win the Olympic golf tournament on Sunday, the first gold medallist in a sport... Reuters India Britain’s Justin Rose birdied the final hole to win the Rio Olympic golf tournament on Sunday, the first gold medallist in a sport returning to the Olympics... S.China Morning Post KYLE SNYDER , 20, becomes youngest gold-medal winning American wrestler in history Twitter giovanni dall'olio EurActiv Rio Olympics confirm Britain as sport superpower: Twenty years after a stinging Olympic fa... https://t.co/5BZYSoW9YZ @EurActiv 12 minutes ago tweetonpolitics-eu Rio Olympics confirm Britain as sport superpower: Twenty years after a stinging Olympic failure, the UK has r... https://t.co/rRu1ztlFKc 12 minutes ago Amandine Viguié Rio Olympics confirm Britain as sport superpower https://t.co/ADj0LqVKhB 21 minutes ago Raymond Gradus RT @EurActiv : Rio Olympics confirm Britain as sport superpower https://t.co/7a1LgJBvEJ https://t.co/go5gI0hGhi 35 minutes ago Alexis Poulin Rio Olympics confirm Britain as sport superpower https://t.co/qHoQro2Kg8 38 minutes ago James Crisp RT @EurActiv : Rio Olympics confirm Britain as sport superpower https://t.co/7a1LgJBvEJ https://t.co/go5gI0hGhi 41 minutes ago
